snippet: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. insists on pulling troops out of the wars abroad, while the others say that's a bad idea.
abstract: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. insists on pulling troops out of the wars abroad, while the others say that's a bad idea.
lead_paragraph: One of the big differences among the Republican candidates for president has long been foreign policy, and it showed again tonight.

headline.main: Republicans Offer Contrast on Foreign Policy at Debate
